trans-unit.source: Visual Studio 2017 common installation issues if running Windows 8.0, try upgrading to Windows 8.1.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 2017 common installation issues if running Windows 8.0, try upgrading to Windows 8.1.

trans-unit.source: This version of Windows is not supported. If you're running Windows 8.0, try upgrading to Windows 8.1
trans-unit.target: This version of Windows is not supported. If you're running Windows 8.0, try upgrading to Windows 8.1

trans-unit.source: When attempting to install Visual Studio, you receive the message: "This version of Windows is not supported.
trans-unit.target: When attempting to install Visual Studio, you receive the message: "This version of Windows is not supported.

trans-unit.source: If you are running Windows 8.0, try upgrading to Windows 8.1" The minimum operating system requirement for Visual Studio on Windows computers is Windows 8.1.
trans-unit.target: If you are running Windows 8.0, try upgrading to Windows 8.1" The minimum operating system requirement for Visual Studio on Windows computers is Windows 8.1.

trans-unit.source: Follow instructions for upgrading to Windows 8.1.
trans-unit.target: Follow instructions for upgrading to Windows 8.1.

trans-unit.source: You can download and install 8.1 from Microsoft Support for free.
trans-unit.target: You can download and install 8.1 from Microsoft Support for free.

trans-unit.source: Launch the Visual Studio installer again.
trans-unit.target: Launch the Visual Studio installer again.
